{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Candle | class = Candle | game = Strife | doomednum = 34 | convid = 222 }}[[Classes]]: Candle
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named CNDLA0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Candle { States { Spawn: KNDL A -1 Bright Stop } }
